Property.name: Location
Property.Description: Author From user AlViPos Мордовия г. Саранск ОАО "Станкостроитель"

Method.name: Insert
Method.Implementation:
&sql( Insert Into Forum.Author ( Name, ExtId ) Values ( :data("Name"), :data("ExtId") ))
if SQLCODE=0 s data = %ROWID Q 1 Q $$$ERROR(,$system.SQL.SQLCODE(SQLCODE))

Method.name: Get
Method.Implementation: #; at first, search by external id if $g(extId)'="" s exist = ..ExtIdExists( extId, .id ) Q:exist id #; s exist = ..NameExists( name, .id ) Q:exist id Q ""

Method.name: GetOrSet
Method.Implementation:
s name = $g(author("Name")), extId = $g(author("ExtId")) s id = ..Get( name, extId ) if id'="" s author=id Q 1
s sc = ..Insert( .author ) Q sc

Method.name: SetLocation
Method.Implementation: &sql( Update Author Set Location = :location, Latitude = :latitude, Longitude = :longitude Where Id =:id ) Q:SQLCODE=0 1 Q $$$ERROR($$$GeneralError,$system.SQL.SQLCODE(SQLCODE))

Method.name: LocationCache
Method.Description: Return known coordinates by name Test: ..LocationCache("Новосибирск") = "82.920430 55.030199"
Method.Implementation: s sql = "Select Top 1 Latitude, Longitude From Forum.Author " _"Where ( Latitude Is Not Null And Longitude Is Not Null ) And Location = ?" s rs = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%ExecDirect(,sql,location) if rs.%Next() Q rs.Latitude _ " " _ rs.Longitude Q ""
